column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/p4867_a95b1199dbcf6c90508250d9b4cfd1df78106a5b/ for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-te

ACK. I had the same thoughts. Also, the partial-spaces caused some issues when fonts were missing those unicode glyphs. Those issues were fixed, but I'm not a big fan of limiting font selection to only those that implement obscure? unicode values.\n

Well the same thin space is used to group per three digits before the
decimal point. There it makes sense. But after the point it just looks
strange.
